column4: Hey guys. If I want to completely remove compiz from my box..... I can just go into synaptic and completely remove all the files that have 'compiz' in them right?
you are proberly safer just not using it.. then 'removing' it.
Because I want to use fluxbox now for practicality.
if you set to use fluxbox.. then you wont be using compiz at all.
